message: Insights are spot on, how do you think technology will change marketing this year?
name: Get Ready For the Advertising World to Transform, Again | DigitalNext: A Blog on Emerging Media and.
caption: adage.com
description: At the onset of each new year, we get excited about the forecasts and predictions. While we've become accustomed to the brisk pace of change, but I'm predicting 2012 will be a huge year of transformation and consolidation in digital media, marketing and technology world. Here's how I see it playing ...
